task.title: Using the Computers
task.shortdesc: The computers found in Shanks 360 & 180 are powerful resources you will want to take advantage of.

taskbody.context: Here are instructions on how to use AirClassroom computers.

step.cmd: Turn on the computer by pressing the "Power" button.
step.stepresult: You will be automatically redirected to the home screen without needing to enter a username or password.

step.cmd: Select the program you would like to use from the Applications folder or desktop toolbar.
step.stepresult: Your program will start and you will be ready to go!

step.cmd: IMPORTANT STEP: When saving, do so with a personal flash or hard drive.
step.stepresult: Program data on AirClassroom computers is erased at the end of each day, so your files will not be saved unless you do so on a separate personal drive.

step.cmd: When you're finished working, turn of the computer by clicking on the "Apple" icon and selecting "Shut Down".

taskbody.result: You will have have the basic knowledge of how to start up and shut down the AirClassroom computers, as well as vital information about saving your important files.
